DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare incidence intensity possible pain injection well patient satisfaction cause long chain triglyceride propofol versus medium/long chain combinated triglyceride propofol endoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Injection Pain Propofol During Endoscopy : LCT Propofol v MCT/LCT Propofol
DOC.criteria: age > 15 yr ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists risk class IIIIV ) III patient undergo gastroscopy significant systemic disease ( American Society Anesthesiologists risk class IIIIV ) history allergic reaction study drug chronic use opioid analgesic psychiatric disorder arrythmia pregnancy age < 18 yr
